nodes.text: The Basic Climbing Gear set was a product of the Pretormin Environmental company which included a series of tools designed to aid users in climbing in wilderness areas. It included spooled lengths of cable with an attachment to secure the line and four quick-adhesion pads capable of attaching to most surfaces. The set cost 50.
The Basic Climbing Gear was first mentioned in the Star Wars: Edge of the Empire Core Rulebook released by Fantasy Flight Games in 2014.
